properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 c1 v4 v5

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's not a Friend
Like the lowly Jesus
No not one
No not one
None else could heal
All our souls diseases
No not one
No not one

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus knows
All about our struggles
He will guide till the
Day is done
There's not a Friend like
The lowly Jesus
No not one
No not one

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No friend like Him
Is so high and holy
No not one
No not one
And yet no friend
Is so meek and lowly
No not one
No not one

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's not an hour
That He is not near us
No not one
No not one
No night so dark
But His love can cheer us
No not one
No not one

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Did ever saint find
This Friend forsake him
No not one
No not one
Or sinner find that
He would not take him
No not one
No not one

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Was e'er a gift like
The Savior given
No not one
No not one
Will He refuse us
A home in heaven
No not one
No not one
